author: BBC Sport
description: Tom Dumoulin's Giro d'Italia lead is cut to 31 seconds after the Dutchman stops for a toilet break on a controversial stage 16.
title: Giro d'Italia: Tom Dumoulin's lead cut after toilet stop on stage 16

author: BBC Sport
description: Pierre Rolland wins stage 17 of the Giro d'Italia, with Tom Dumoulin retaining a 31-second overall lead.
title: Giro d'Italia: Pierre Rolland wins stage 17 as Tom Dumoulin retains overall lead

description: An emergency call of nature sees a desperately unlucky Tom Dumoulin lose a large chunk of his lead at the Giro d'Italia after a thrilling 16th stage.
title: Giro leader's lead wiped away by emergency toilet break

description: Giro-Spitzenreiter Tom Dumoulin hat nach seinem Missgeschick vom Vortag auf der gemäßigten Gebirgsetappe keine weitere Zeit eingebüßt.
title: Radsport: Giro-Primus Dumoulin wieder fit

description: Drei Tage vor dem Ende des 100. Giro d'Italia fährt Tom Dumoulin weiter im Rosa Trikot des Spitzenreiters.
title: Radsport: Gesamtsieg für Dumoulin immer wahrscheinlicher
